comments.author: Pradep
comments.content: Dei apdi paatha aairam vishayam irukku da . Do you know the Mobile Phone Surgery ? Goons will cut the power supply of an operation theatre in which Captain is a Doctor (ROFL) . There are no generators or Inverters or UPS ses in the Hospital . So Cap tells everyone to take off their cellphone and on it . They do surgery in that light :D . I never knew Basic model nokia phones emit as much light as Police spotlights . We must put a seperate list for Cap and all da .
